Package org.uclab.mm.icl.llc.MachineLearningTools

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EventBasedSegmentation
    This class segments the audio data, based on the event (when there is no voice, this class filters that void period)
    ExtClassification
    This Class build the predictive model by all of classifier from weka library
    FeatureExtraction<InputType,OutputType>
    This class extracts features from the data
    FilterBankPreprocessing
    This class extract computable data with Filter-Bank Algorithms such as LPC, MFCC, Spectrums
    MachineLearning
    this interface defines basic structure of machine learning algorithm implementation
    Preprocessing<InputType,OutputType>  
    Segmentation<InputType,OutputType>  
    SilentRemoverPreprocessing
    This Class remove silent from audio data
    StatisticalFeatureExtraction
    This Class extract statistical feature such as mean, stddev, etc.
    TimeDomainFeatureExtraction
    This Class extract time-domain features based on seconds
    WindowBasedSegmentation
    This Class segment audio data based on seconds
